description:
When the prep_resize method performs an exception to resend the command to conductor, the exception is as follows:

title: prep_resize cannot call reschedule correctly

comments.content:
When the prep_resize method performs an exception to resend the command to conductor, the exception is as follows:

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~atkisc

comments.content:
Are you using devstack? If so, by default, devstack is running in "superconductor" mode which won't allow "up-calls" from the nova-compute service to the top-level conductor service to perform a reschedule. That's explained here:

https://docs.openstack.org/nova/latest/user/cellsv2_layout.html#operations-requiring-upcalls

And you can change devstack to perform reschedules by setting CELLSV2_SETUP=singleconductor in your local.conf for devstack.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
